thread.title: Ice T, Wife Coco & Daughter Chanel Are So Merry in Their Matching Christmas Sweaters

author: Chris Phelan
title: Ice T, Wife Coco & Daughter Chanel Are So Merry in Their Matching Christmas Sweaters
text:
Create a free profile to get unlimited access to exclusive show news, updates, and more!
Ice T, Wife Coco & Daughter Chanel Are So Merry in Their Matching Christmas Sweaters
The SVU star and his family were clearly in the holiday spirit this Christmas â€” while wearing Body Count merch.
It looks like it was a very merry â€” and fashionable â€” Christmas for [Ice T](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/people/ice-t) and his family!
In a December 25 Instagram post, the longtime [Law & Order: Special Victims Unit](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/show/law-order-special-victims-unit) star shared adorable photos of his family all decked out in festive merch from [his band, Body Count](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/law-order-svu-ice-t-career-recap). (You can snag one of your own Body Count holiday sweaters [at their online store](https://bodycountmerch.net/products/xmas-sweater-pre-sale)).
Ice T, his [wife Coco Austin](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/ice-t-on-jimmy-fallon-wife-coco-daughter-chanel-birthday-interview), and their nine-year-old [daughter Chanel](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/ice-t-daughter-chanel-new-lookalike-pic) were in full Christmas spirit mode as they prepared to open their impressive haul of gifts.
"Happy Holidays from the 'Ice Family' ðŸŽ„ðŸŽ…ðŸ¤¶ðŸŽðŸ¥‚," they captioned the sweet roundup.
The super-sweet Christmas pics mark another successful photo op for the fam, who's been known to take full advantage [of unique places like elevators](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/ice-t-daughter-family-vacation-outifits) to capture heartwarming family moments. The clan has also been known to travel through airports in the [most delightful fashion ](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/ice-t-family-riding-electric-suitcases-airport)[ever](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/ice-t-family-riding-electric-suitcases-airport) â€” guess there's never a dull moment when Coco and Ice T are Mom and Dad!
And the musician and SVU star is quick to credit his wife for creating Christmas magic.
"Christmas â€” Coco does all that," Ice T told [Jimmy Fallon](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/people/jimmy-fallon) on December 14. "If it wasn't for her, there would be no holidays, as far as Ice T is concerned."
[RELATED: Ice T Reveals a Golden Rule That Keeps Him & Wife Coco From Arguing: â€œWe Justâ€¦"](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/ice-t-on-jimmy-fallon-wife-coco-daughter-chanel-birthday-interview)
Ice T, Coco, and Chanel wore matching Body Count Christmas sweaters by the tree
Ice T never misses an opportunity to rep the heavy metal band [he's been fronting](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/ice-ts-voice-is-rock-roll-dynamite-covering-pink-floyd) since 1990. Though most music fans know Ice T was one of the most prominent West Coast rappers of the '90s, he also has roots in metal â€” and the future SVU star first formed the band nearly 35 years ago.
Body Count recently released Merciless, their eighth studio album, on November 22, 2024, with industry outlet [Metal Hammer](https://www.loudersound.com/reviews/body-count-merciless) calling the album an "ice-cold knock-out." Ice T and Body Count performed their Pink Floyd cover, "Comfortably Numb," on [The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/show/the-tonight-show-starring-jimmy-fallon) on December 4.
Of course, headbanging runs in the family â€” even Chanel has been known to [join her dad on stage](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/ice-t-daughter-chanel-performed-with-body-count-band) to unleash the rock from time to time.
[RELATED: Matthew McConaughey Singing "Christmas (Baby Please Come Home)" Is Pure Holiday Joy](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/matthew-mcconaughey-singing-christmas-baby-please-come-home-jimmy-fallon-haim)
Ice T's daughter, Chanel, turned nine in November
Speaking of little Chanel â€” a [social media sensation](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/ice-t-daughter-chanel-tonight-show) in her own right â€” Ice T's family recently came together to celebrate an important milestone: her ninth birthday.
Chanel appeared equally shocked and embarrassed at the birthday surprise that occurred in an Arizona restaurant â€” it was [a cute and ](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/ice-t-wife-coco-austin-daughter-chanel-surprise-birthday)[loud](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/ice-t-wife-coco-austin-daughter-chanel-surprise-birthday)[ moment](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/ice-t-wife-coco-austin-daughter-chanel-surprise-birthday) that we're sure Chanel will remember for the rest of her life.
